1110000100011010 1110001010100001 1 -> sum: 1100001110111100, cout: 1

1111001110000110 1101010111001011 1 -> sum: 1100100101010010, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
